name: Ultimate Speed Rush
description:
Choose your stock car and race on 5 different speedways.

Experience the Ultimate Speed Rush racing on your device.
You can adjust the level of difficulty, to suit your preference.

The game features:

- Vibrant user interface: realistic graphics and physics!
- You may choose from Powerful V8 race cars.
- You can play the game under multiple levels and under multiple difficulty levels, which are easy, medium, and hard.
- The game presents easy control: Screen touch pads / Tilting your device / Auto throttle.
- The Ultimate Speed Rush game is built with full HD support: it is a real fun to play!

Fight for every position on the tracks of Ultimate Speed Rush!
You can test your skills in awesome simulation on stock race tracks.
